website_summaries.verdict: A good mid-level printing calculator that offers advanced mathematical functionality.
pros: Large screen is easy to read in light and dark conditions
Heavy-duty keys last through a lot of abuse and use
Comes with a built-in antimicrobial layer for hygiene
cons: The built-in paper holder can keep the calculator tape loose on the spool

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE calculator of all time
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE calculator of all time! In acctg, you are as good as your tools and this is my fave. Total button at the thumb. :-) Update: here's a pic with dimensions. The paper is fully extended . Also for those who have questions about the decimal point; if you do not want to constantly hit the decimal while you are adding, use the pic and set yours that way. It will automatically put in the decimal to look like this 0.00.
customer_reviews.author: In Tacoma Waiting...

customer_reviews.title: Great machine at reasonable cost!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, thought I had already done the feedback! This is a wonderful machine - I just use it in my tax business .....I know, using a mechanical adding machine when you already have a computer, well its more than that to me. I've been in the tax business for over 40 years and not once during those years did I not have a calculator on hand. Or for that matter, an IBM Selectric Typewriter - not sure I could do my job without both of these "old style mechanical pieces". Thanks guys - great machine at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTaxMan

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one for personal use at home and it does great. The tape (paper) doesn't get jammed
customer_reviews.text: As an accountant I use this product almost daily. My last one lasted for at least 6 years (it was used by the previous employee for I don't know how many years). I bought this one for personal use at home and it does great. The tape (paper) doesn't get jammed. The ink rolls haven't had any issues with drying out. The numbers are easy to read on the display as well as the print out. The keys are easy to push. The speed can keep up with me, others have had delays. It's fairly quiet for being a printing calculator.
customer_reviews.author: ladywoods

customer_reviews.title: I tried to reset it with the reset button on bottom of the machine like the owner's manual says but it was still unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: This machine lasted just long enough to get out of the warranty period and then it died. I tried to reset it with the reset button on bottom of the machine like the owner's manual says but it was still unresponsive. Also tried to reset it by unplugging it for a while and plugging it into another outlet but it still acts like it has no power. This machine was a total waste of money. I would have been better off buying a pad of paper and a few pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Brown

customer_reviews.title: Feature laden printing calculator ideal, too complicated for person use; inadequate for business
customer_reviews.text: This well made product is a feature laden printing calculator for a very small business with no employees, because it cannot retain a record of sales and sales taxes etc... Even then, this product is out of date even for such small business because of inexpensive computer based cash registers, which retains all the transactions for customer returns ,reporting sales taxes and preventing employee theft. For person use, as in my case, for balancing check books or verifying tax returns, this product is too complicated, non intuitive and difficult to use. No wonder Sharp Company has been in financial trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Tien H. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: My favorite calculator
customer_reviews.text: I have used this calculator for years, until I changed jobs. The other calculates were missing the Constant key (K) which I use frequently. After 3 years I received permission to order this calculator. My frustration level has plummeted, now that I don't have to enter the same number over and over to divide costs among the different teams. Fast enough to keep up with nimble fingers. Easy to change ribbon and paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakamama

customer_reviews.title: Great Calulator - But SO Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: This calculator calculates like a champ! I loved the design, size, button placement, speed, calculating options etc. The only disappointment was the noise factor when printing. I use a calculator all day/every day and need a machine that prints, so using it with printing turned off was not an option. I ended up returning this product but not because there was anything wrong with how it functions - I just couldn't tolerate the constant loud noise when in print mode (which is why I only gave it 3 stars). Otherwise, this calculator was great! If you just need a calculator infrequently, the sound may not be an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: Camayo

customer_reviews.title: Oh GOOD!  Easy to see without eye glasses.
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a paper tape on this modern calculator. I also use it for genealogy which requires date calculations and having it next to the PC gives me the convenience of having a paper reference without using pen and loose papers. The "modern touch" this calculator has is a built-in clock, and calendar; handy for bookkeeping tasks, and genealogy work, as well as any miscellaneous use where the date and time are required. The keypad has a solid touch - easy to work. The screen display is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: kitchen cabinet

customer_reviews.title: Calculator worked efficiently and has all the tools I need and is a good size. The display for the numbers is large ...
customer_reviews.text: Received item quickly and was packaged well. Calculator worked efficiently and has all the tools I need and is a good size. The display for the numbers is large and bright so I can see the numbers clearly, very important. The only thing I don't like is the total button is on the left for for my thumb......not on the right where my pinky is and where I am used to. This will take some time to retrain my hand. It was an afterthought but maybe there are calculators made for right and left handed people---I'm a righty. Still a great buy and probably won't be a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: robertalov

customer_reviews.title: Want an Old School Calculator with a tape?  Here it is.
customer_reviews.text: Yep, after 10 years of complaining how I hated the on screen calculator, my husband said, well why don't you buy a desk style? I love it. It has a tape so you can track the numbers you have found and it has that old 10 key touch that I found my fingers remembered. It has a ton of functions I will likely never use but you never know. Very Old School item, but old isn't always a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: 0/10 never buy from this guy again
customer_reviews.text: I understand the product is used, but it's a whole 'nother thing if the box has ripped holes in it, the screen is covered in dust from the 90's, the reset button still has ink on it like a drunk trying to unlock his door, and oh yeah it doesn't even work. Why even go thru the extra step of including your 7/10s used roll of receipt paper like I wanted that? But then maybe I'm impressed at the level of laziness required to sell your trash on amazon rather than step outside and maybe see your neighbors you basement dwelling NEET.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Spring

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tape holder
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the keys and everything EXCEPT the arm that holds the calculator tape. Put a spool of ribbon on a 1/4" dowel 4" wide and see how long it takes for the ribbon spool to completely fall off and go rolling across the floor. if you never move the device you won't have this problem but I'm pretty sure at some point you will want to pick it up for some reason. Also, the tape does not remain snuggly coiled so you have big loops of tape. The calculator where the tape fits in between two arms with bumps fitting inside the tape core is MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Key arrangement different!
customer_reviews.text: I am used to having the "total" key to the right of the add button. This one is to the extreme left. I wanted to use this at home to get better at 10 key typing, but its opposite of what I have at work. How confusing is that. And I think it is malfunctioning. It does some funny calculations.
customer_reviews.author: JacqueLipp

customer_reviews.title: FNtastick adding machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Had one for almost 25 years, same brand but little less sophisticated model and when it finally died, I thought I could replace it with any cheap model and I was wrong! All three replacements, not Sharp, died within a year and I was Looking at doing taxes with no machine. This one is fantastic. Sturdy, does all the right calculations, easy to read and prints. Hopefully, it will last me another 25 years like it’s predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: mamamed

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable calculator and poor to non-existent warranty
customer_reviews.text: Addition function stopped working after 32 days. After hassling with customer service for 1-2 weeks they agreed I could return it at my expense. So I paid the $8 to return it to be fixed. 3 weeks later still no calculator. In the past, they made a good product, but obviously not anymore. Manufacturer warranty is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: tyronne

customer_reviews.title: great small business calculator
customer_reviews.text: nice tactical feeling keys , smaller spacing so it doesnt stretch your fingers out print is dark and clear paper feeds good display is bright overall a great office calculator would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wore out the first one...bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a calculator with printer on it, this one works great. Good all around calculator with printer. Keys press easily. Nice 12 digit panel showing the entries. Movable decimal. Printer can be turned off/on. Take standard ribbons and paper rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Sider

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The roll of paper slips around on a poorly designed roll holder. The roll of ink barely makes a mark on the paper, which is the whole point of this machine ... to have a paper verification of one's calculation result. I bought this because I will be living in two locations. My 44-year-old machine, made by the same manufacturer and of the same style, is far superior to this new model. The window of return has closed, because I waited to open this package until I moved. My mistake. Don't get stuck with this calculator ... you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Keys
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of box (with evidence that the box had been previously opened), plugged it in, and started testing all the keys. Sometimes the "0" and "4" does not print/enter. Found that if you touch it several different ways, you can occasionally make the faulty keys work. Not good enough for my use. Contacted the seller to explain the issue. They were very cordial and apologetic for the issues and took the printing calculator back without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has to work from home with the Covid-19 crisis. She is in banking and crunching numbers all. She wanted a heavy duty calculator. She says this is exactly what she wanted. Durable, comfortable to use and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable, dependable calculator for our office.
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these Sharp calculators for our office. I have used many brands and styles over 39 years, but always come back to this classic machine. It is a bit large for home use, but is durable and inexpensive to maintain. I would definitely recommend this calculator for accounting use.
customer_reviews.author: BossladyMC

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a CPA, semi-retired now, and have used a calculator for many years. When I opened my own practice in1992 after working for larger firms I needed a heavy duty ”professional” model with the same key pattern and key function I was used to. It lasted until I spilled coffee on it. I needed a replacement with the same key pattern and function again. This one appeared to match what I needed, and it does. Don’t know that it will last as long as my old one, but it won’t get such heavy use anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: These are the only calculators we use in our office. As older models break down we replace them with this one.!!!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA A. DOCKER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: If you need a competent, quiet and reliable calculator...this is it. Many, many years ago I had purchased the same model, and just plain wore it out. So, of course my replacement was the same model. Nice to see that made some minor, but helpful improvements. Easy to read numerals and comfortable hand placement. Sharp made an excellent product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reader338

customer_reviews.title: Printer failed barely after a year of limited use.  So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My last Sharp calculator lasted for almost 12 years. I need a printing calculator so I purchased this in April 2017. The printer failed after 14 months without heavy use. I am so disappointed. Just like everything nowadays. Built to fail so you have to buy another. I wish we still built things like our grandparents did. They took pride in their work and built things to last. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: sb-store

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my old calculator which no longer wanted to feed paper thru. This was basically the same calculator but was much less expensive than before. Wish it had a longer cord but works well for what I need. I'm retired so I need to be able to use the different functions but it does not get beaten to death. It's always there when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 4 Ragdolls

customer_reviews.title: Worthy for the office
customer_reviews.text: Really great calculator! I am very particular about button size and being able to use the keys with ease. This calculator has good buttons that you don’t have to press hard, the screen is bright and numbers are big. Bought several for my office and have had no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: ksburr

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my desktop
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for about a month but so far it's great! It's exactly what I wanted and then some...I had a hard time setting up the date and time because the instructions were a little vague but eventually I was able to figure it out. The unit is exactly the same as the one I use at my office. It prints fast - not like those smaller portable electronic ones that take a long time and make a lot of noise. This one keeps up with my keystrokes and the print size and display are easy to read. I like the date option, you can print the date on your receipts!
customer_reviews.author: joeySum

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the exact one I had for 15 years of hard work. I'm hoping this one last as long as the other did. And its easy for me to see the keys and read out. Eyes aren't what they use to be. I love this calculator easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia L. Knight

customer_reviews.title: I got comfortable with this calculator in the 80"s and have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I got comfortable with this calculator in the 80"s and have been using and buying these since then. They have changed slightly through the years and yet blinding can hit my numbers. Now all I have to do is not keep my coffee so close to it.
customer_reviews.author: N Marsack

customer_reviews.title: Love this calculator
customer_reviews.text: Love this calculator. Had to buy a new one to replace an old one. Then spilled coffee on it soon after. Recommend not sharing any liquids with this machine. Replaced the “coffee machine”. With the same model.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to my desk!
customer_reviews.text: I used an antiquated Sharp EL-1197 For many years. When it needed replaced I ordered a newer version of the same calculator. It is wonderful...does everything I need it for and it prints clear and crisp. Couldn't be happier with the new calculator I am now using.
customer_reviews.author: Kousa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: this calculator is exactly what I needed here at work! I should have paid more attention to the size, it was a bit bigger than I expected but that's my fault, otherwise I love it
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Sent a different (cheaper) brand calculator in the Sharp box
customer_reviews.text: The box was for this model, but inside was a Canon (cheaper) calculator, very disappointed because I needed this specific calculator by today. Getting a refund, but that doesn't fix my need for this calculator today.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Cullins

customer_reviews.title: The Calculator works great. The numbers and calculation buttons are all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Calculator works great. The numbers and calculation buttons are all the same as my last one, a big reason + the reduced price for ordering this one. I don't have any need for the time. I just need it to do our home/business income and expense calculations. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hukserose

customer_reviews.title: I have used this model Sharp Calculator for years
customer_reviews.text: This calculator works well for me in my accounting practice. Replaced the one I had as I dropped it and it broke:(. I currently have three of these machines in different offices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an older model (which I had over 20 years) and am not disappointed. So nice to have a new calculator for doing taxes!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of different calculators to suit my needs and this one works great and is comfortable on my hand. It is medium sized and not too heavy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: sharp calulator  1197
customer_reviews.text: excellent calculator... looks good and work fine...also i like the clock and date feature in the machine,,, would highly recommend this sharp calculator....
customer_reviews.author: Burton Glick

customer_reviews.title: Froze UP!
customer_reviews.text: It froze up. It's getting power, but it won't do anything but roll the paper up. Haven't even had it a year. Otherwise, love this model... have had quite a few. They just don't last!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NO GOOD, A PIECE OF
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several years ago, and it has only had light use. It froze up, and will not work. I followed all the troubleshooting to reset this calculator, but nothing has worked. I have an old calculator that is at least 25 years old, and it still works. DO NOt buy this ITEM, IT IS NO GOOD, A PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Nick Laney

customer_reviews.title: This is a serious machine for those who crunch numbers.
customer_reviews.text: We use this machine to track home budgeting but it far exceeds our needs and past machines we have used. I would recommend it for it's quality and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jack 323

customer_reviews.title: Love this calculator.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old Sharp product that I had used. This one is great. Easy to use with good functions. Looks very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Val;ue
customer_reviews.text: We use this adding machine in our office. We have used this model for years. Clear LCD display, makes it easy to read. Love this calculator. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Good Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these at work and with the recent situation, I was one of the employees sent to work from home. I wanted the same type I was used to using and this is it. Came fast and in good condition. Works great. Only thing I would say is make sure if you want to utilize the printing option, to buy some printing paper for it - it only comes with a very small reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the Add2 feature
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator with lots of features. I wish I had realized that it does not have the Add2 decimal feature before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose P.

customer_reviews.title: This calculator has keys in the position I am accustomed ...
customer_reviews.text: This calculator has keys in the position I am accustomed to and that's important to me. I do bookkeeping in my husband's office and my previous Sharp calculator died after 13 years. This one is just what I needed to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned these days but reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I've made sure I had this version calculators and its predecessors on every job I've had as an adult (Lots of years, lots of jobs) I finally bought one for myself and it wore out and this replaces it avg life in avg office about 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: maxwell-hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works just like a calculator should!
customer_reviews.text: I had this model before and didn't know that it has a calendar and clock! I just set the clock... I am a CPA and use a calculator all the time. We love Sharp calculators at our office!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Theis

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, new product, easy instructions. Smooth transition from the older model I had. The touch is different but just a matter of getting used to the feel.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miller

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my fathers 35-40 year old Sharp
customer_reviews.text: This was the closet replacement to the one my father used for 35-40 years. He is a CPA and one of the buttons started to finally stick. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Denkhaus

customer_reviews.title: Fine...
customer_reviews.text: Works normally for accounting. The previous one I purchased many years ago got the ribbon screwed up...
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Winquist

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had one just like this used it for years until I wore it out. Got this one from this vendor great value and exactly like what I had except brand new. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Easy to set up and exactly as advertised. New condition and works great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CALCULATOR
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Has all the functions I need. I'm leery to give it five stars because in the past all the calculators I've purchased have had some problem after are 1-1 1/2 years. I will review again when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Updated to the newer version
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my old Sharp calculator, which finally died after 16 years of use. This one is just what I expected and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: myway

customer_reviews.title: Good Calculator for Home use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a retired accountant who uses this item for heavy home office. I have used Sharp Calcs. for many years and this one is fast with numerous functions and should last many years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Office use
customer_reviews.text: The calculator is exactly what I wanted and needed. The total key is on the left which is where I wanted it . I have had this calculator before and glad I was able to find it again.
customer_reviews.author: MaureenAdams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after i read some of the reviews but it is comfortable to use and the keys are far enough apart that i dont fat finger something. I like it a lot. Im so glad i bought it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10-key like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: I'm old school. I bought lots of paper tape, too. This calculator is just like the one I have at work, so I can add and subtract to my heart's content. My calculator arrived nicely packaged and quickly. This calculator also has a date function, so save the instructions so you can use it. Because you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Really is not what I was looking for. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Really is not what I was looking for. It's more of a calculator than an adding machine. I think it have to return it. Just giving it a little time to get used to it if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Tbirddriver5

customer_reviews.title: confusing to use
customer_reviews.text: just did not like it... confusing to use, way too many gadgets for what I needed. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Calculator arrived quickly and was as described. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: skaterd

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product. It was the perfect choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: xxxxxxxxxx
customer_reviews.text: The product replaces my Sharp calculator purchased over 20 years ago. The calculator is used on a daily basis for my financial position. Looking forward to the same quality and service from Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend and haven’t heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Short

customer_reviews.title: A work horse calculator
customer_reviews.text: We've had an older generation of this in our office for MANY years. It finally died last week and I am replacing it with the current model. It was rated well with consumer reports and I am counting on it being a great tool for at least 10 + more years. It has an easy to read digital screen, , easy to change ink and paper and solid base.
customer_reviews.author: Rockbridge Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: well made and great value
customer_reviews.text: the only complaint is the ink printing is to light
customer_reviews.author: leonardwong

customer_reviews.title: Speed and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I used this model calculator for at least 15-20 years. I was glad to see they still make it and at a reasonable price. The "killer IRS CPA" uses it in the office to add up the receipts and financial information with speed and accuracy. Highly recommend to all people who are ten key by touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mastriano

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected but not disappointed in the quality and the functions this 10-key printer provides. The color shown appears to be almost a minty green, but it is actually beige/tan which I appreciate a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sagittarian

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality machine and a pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality machine and a pleasure to use. I had previously bought a cheaper model by another brand which constantly dropped numbers, causing me to start all over. This one is more like my older machines that I loved until they wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Dame

customer_reviews.title: Best 10 key
customer_reviews.text: Best 10 key I have ever owned, and I have bought many.
customer_reviews.author: Lnntthmps

customer_reviews.title: They work well.
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 4th or 5th one of these calculators I have had over a period of probably 30 years. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: WKBT

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use & directions
customer_reviews.text: Last model lasted nearly 15 yrs before printer motor died but all other functions still worked; only last two years occasionally got a weird answer when balancing checkbook & had to re*enter to double check & get correct answer
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator! Great made and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator! Great made and good quality. Used one like this for years and hunted to find another like it. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This new one replaced an older one that we've had for several years that finally gave out. We liked the old one so much we replaced it with the same make and model. We are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great calculator except it went dead 4 months after I received it, light is on but no keys work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Office calculator
customer_reviews.text: Works very well . Easy to learn. Like the date feature
customer_reviews.author: Tireperson

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid sturdy calculator. Had a Sharp EL 1801V for many years that started smearing the numbers but can still use as calculator. Has more features so it took a little time to figure how to add in a way I am used to. If it lasts like the 1801 it will be well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Nasarzewski

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are not in same location as Canon
customer_reviews.text: After using Canon layout keyboards for decades I can't train this old dog to this keyboard. Not the machine's fault but I've ordered a Canon. Otherwise it Works nicely and prints quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Needed an upgrade from the Casio. This calculator is perfect. Love the touch of the keys and fast print. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia S.

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator. It's fast
customer_reviews.text: Good calculator. It's fast, low noise and produces results as fast as I can type. It is a bit large, but it's so much better than my previous calculator. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Morgan

customer_reviews.title: my favorite. Arrived timely and in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: This brand and style of calculator is my choice, always. Each accountant wants their own feel and their own location of the total button. Ha! This is, without a doubt, my favorite. Arrived timely and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Winton

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: This is a te-purchase. The same model finally gave up. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PVE

customer_reviews.title: Great Calculator!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the keys are large enough for my fingers so there is less mis-keying. The only thing I would have like to have had would be at least one replacement ribbon included. The ribbons you have to order on-line, I wasn't able to find them anywhere local to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it brand new and used it for the first time six months later and it quit working after the first time. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Hochstedler

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I've been using 10-key calculators for about ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've been using 10-key calculators for about 35 years, and I am very picky. I'm really happy with this one. The keys are laid out well, and the touch is just right.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, dependable operation.
customer_reviews.text: Love this calculator glad I could purchase the same model I have been using for years!
customer_reviews.author: The Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice calculator for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three of these for our office. The first one I ordered is now two years old. I keep ordering this model number because it is easy to use, quiet and has all the functions necessary for our day to day needs.
customer_reviews.author: Karla P

customer_reviews.title: This is the one... the best, the often copied, never replicated.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one... the best, the often copied, never replicated.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator
customer_reviews.text: So the calculator I was given at work had all the buttons backward from what I was used to so I ordered this one. It's perfect and works well. Sharp generally lasts long so I'm hoping this one does too
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the$$$
customer_reviews.text: Product replaces an older unit that my wife used. She wanted one just like the old unit. It works great and has all the keys she needs. Arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calculator of all time. I do bookkeeping professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kelea K. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Look no further for your office staff calculator needs. And when you get this on Amazon, you can almost always pick one up for $55 or less, which is a screamin’ deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby1128

customer_reviews.title: ... this calculator for my mother and she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this calculator for my mother and she is very happy with it, and as we all learn, 'If the Mommy ain't happy, ain't nobody happy!'
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fine machine once you've wasted time googling how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: . It seems to be well made and stable. The directions past initial set up are sketchy at best. I feel that this is a major issue since I would think operation would be nearly intuitive, but it isn't. The product screams for a much better owner's manual.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, waited 3 weeks to get the calculator only ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, waited 3 weeks to get the calculator only to find it didn't work!! clearly not checked before it was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: rc 5280

customer_reviews.title: #8 key was stuck
customer_reviews.text: Sharp makes a good 10key but this one was defective and sold used as very good. 8 key would stick or not print at all
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator at an ever greater price. For my home office it does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TerryH

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping and a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Im glad I spent the extra dollars to purchase this adding machine. It is well made and works just like it should!
customer_reviews.author: Oopsy Daisy

product_meta.title: Sharp EL-1197PIII Heavy Duty Color Printing Calculator with Clock and Calendar
product_meta.description:
12 digit calculator is perfect for the everyday advanced user, especially in a busy office setting. Extra heavy duty durability is perfect for power users. Features extra large fluorescent display digits for easy viewing. You can count on the fast and reliable 4.5 lines-per-second ribbon printer. The keys are engineered with a Microban Antimicrobial protection that reduces the growth of microbes and bacteria, which can cause discoloration and odors. Professional keyboard layout with left-side total key. 4 key independent memory with second recall memory function.

AMAZON.COM
The Sharp EL-1197P drum printing calculator is an indispensable tool forheavy offices uses. The EL-1197P has a large 10-digit blue fluorescent display and prints characters in black at 3 lines per second on standard paper rolls.

The EL-1197P has four-key memory (memory plus, memory minus, andrecall/clear) and special functions keys including grand total, addingmode, constant, double zero key, mark-up/profit-margin key, item counter, androunding settings. Rely on Sharp's independent memory for consistentreckonings. Decimal settings are adjustable from floating to fixed decimalplaces (6-3-2-1-0).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This printing calculator features a bright green fluorescent display with 3-digit punctuation. The calculator also features a floating(F)/fixed(3-2-0) decimal point, adding mode (A), minus sign, error and memory indicators. There is also a power switch with print/item count mode selector, decimal selector control; constant/add mode, rounding, and grand total/rate setting selectors. This mechanical printer accepts 57mm (2-1/4") to 58mm (2-9/32") wide x 80mm (3-5/32") diameter paper rolls maximum. Prints approximately 3.6 lines/second. 8-31/32" width x 12-3/8" depth x 2-25/32" height, 3.75 pounds.

See more
